description: A short film of the 100 year history of the building covering its time as a school, wartime ARP station and British Restaurant and school dinners centre. Display boards and volunteers available to answer any questions or show people around the space.  Teas and coffees and cakes, commemorative brochures and mugs will be available for purchase. Live music of songs from the last 100 years.

factsheet.heading: 100 years of Mornington Hall
paragraphs: CADOS are very happy to invite the public to share in our 100 year celebration of Mornington Hall.  We will show a short film of the 100 year history of the building covering its time as a school, wartime ARP station and British Restaurant and school dinners centre. Display boards and volunteers available to answer any questions or show people around the space. There will be teas, coffees and cakes. Commemorative brochures and mugs will be available for purchase. CADOS Music Makers will provide live music, including songs from the last 100 years.

location.address: Mornington Hall, The Green Walk, Chingford, E4 7ER
travel_info: Additional travel info: Buses: 97, 179, 212, 313, 379, 385, 397, 444.  10 mins walk from Chingford Station.

name: Mornington Hall
